34
Seibert, Warren F.
Head, Instructional Media
Research Unit
Memorial Center
Purdue University
Lafayette, Indiana
Film Testing Study. (an invest¬
igation of the motion picture as
a medium for educational and
psychological testing.) Sponsorr
ship: Title VII, NDEA
"Factorial Composition of Learn¬
ing from Film" (seeks to trace
the changing factorial composi¬
tion of the learning result from
repeated exposure to instructional
film) Sponsorship: Title VII,
NDEA
"Internal Variables in Programmed
Instruction and Their Relation¬
ship to Learning Gains and
Retention." (using their new
"posse procedure")
Slingland, Robert P.
Director of Television
Education
Central Administration
8th and Tacoma Avenue
Tacoma, Washington
Small independent research of
criteria used for developing tele¬
vision guides for classroom
Bldg, teachers. Thirty stations con¬
tacted.
Smagorinsky, Melvin P. "A Study of Oral Feedback in a
Associate Professor and Psychology Course Taught by CCTV
Director of Instructional and by Conventional Methods."
Television Center
State University College
Brockport, New York
Smith, Ralph L.
Director
Radio-TV Programs
Illinois State University
Normal, Illinois
"The Training of Language Resource
Teachers for Televised Spanish"
(this will be a descriptive report
of a two-year project in elementary
grades Spanish instruction in which
the television teacher was assisted
by a student teacher minoring in
the language.)
